summary: This is a search warrant issued by the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York authorizing the search of Jeffrey Epstein's residence at 9 East 71st Street, New York, NY. The warrant seeks evidence related to violations of sex trafficking of minors and conspiracy, specifically targeting electronic devices and media containing communications, photographs, and records related to victims and potential victims.

persons.name: Henry Pitman
persons.context: Issued the search warrant for the premises at 9 East 71st Street, New York, NY, related to violations of sex trafficking of minors and conspiracy.

events.title: Search Warrant Execution Deadline
events.description: Deadline by which the search warrant for 9 East 71st Street must be executed.

events.title: Search Warrant Issuance
events.description: U.S. Magistrate Judge Henry Pitman issued the search warrant for Jeffrey Epstein's New York residence.

locations: 9 East 71st Street, New York, New York
keyFacts: The search warrant targets Jeffrey Epstein's New York residence at 9 East 71st Street for evidence of sex trafficking of minors and conspiracy.
The warrant specifically authorizes seizure of electronic devices and storage media containing communications, photographs, and records related to victims and potential victims.
The warrant includes authority to search for nude or sexually suggestive photographs of individuals who appear to be teenage girls or younger.
The warrant was issued by U.S. Magistrate Judge Henry Pitman and had to be executed by July 12, 2019.
The legal basis for the search is violations of Title 18, United States Code, Sections 1591 (sex trafficking of minors) and 371 (conspiracy).
